Isabella Rodriguez.description: Isabella Rodriguez opens Hobbs Cafe at 9:00am and works at the counter until 8pm. She plans on having a Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe with her customers on February 14th, 2023 from 5pm to 7pm. Currently, she is gathering party material and telling everyone to join the party at Hobbs Cafe.
